import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { StatisticService } from 'src/app/services/statistic/statistic.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { constructor(private statisticService: StatisticService, private router: Router){} generatedGardens :number = 2; registeredOwners :number = 3; registeredDecorators :number = 34; async ngOnInit() { this.generatedGardens = 2; this.registeredOwners = 3; this.registeredDecorators = 34; } }
